div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 338 Gortyna (mod. Aghioi Dheka), Crete, c. 1966 Burial: c. 87-85 B.C.? Contents: 329 AR. Pot hoard Gortyna: 2 dr. (Zeus hd./Europa on bull) 102 dr. (Zeus hd./hero stdg.) 181 dr. (Zeus hd./Apollo stdg.) Imit. Rhodes (struck on Crete ?): 44 dr. (43 ctmk.) Disposition: unknown Price, RN 1966, pp. 128-43, illus. Photographs and some casts now in BM
